meanings.sent1: The coistril stole my lunch money.
meanings.sent2: The town was wary of the coistril who roamed the streets.
meanings.sent3: The coistril tried to convince everyone he was a prince in disguise.
meanings.sent4: Beware of the coistril's silver tongue and cunning ways.
meanings.sent5: The coistril's sly grin gave away his true intentions.

meanings.sent1: My little brother can be such a coistril when he wants to play a prank.
meanings.sent2: The coistril tricked the villagers into buying fake potions.
meanings.sent3: The coistril pretended to be a ghost to scare his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with mischief like a coistril planning a heist.
meanings.sent5: The coistril's cunning plan unraveled when he tripped over his own shoelaces.
